title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition
Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition
notes:
Works fine to some extent ~✓
- On Alt-Tab it crashes
- It's hard to get to options and set resolution to native due to glitchy mouse movement
- After setting resolution to native mouse works kinda fine
- "Single" player with bots (Training, Deathmatch etc.) works fine
- Multiplayer works fine as well

title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition
notes: After starting a match menu controls stop spawning

title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Character runs way too fast when using nVidia GPU, game works fine on Intel GPU or when changed to software rendering mode.
title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 Fury Series (FIJI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.7-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Everything but alt-tab works fine. Seriously, surround works really great on a 5.1 system. The DirectX setup wizard at the beginning is a bit annoying, though. Multiplayer is generally broken due to ACE v0.8 anti-cheat detecting that the kernel32.dll has been modified...
title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Only need how to add patch to this game but run very goods
title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition

notes: I didn't test Alt-Tab, but I played several games with no issues.
title: Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition
Unreal Tournament: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Runs well with OpenGL. Multiplayer works, but only without anti-cheat, so you will get kicked from most servers.
